game.name: Cosmo Blue - A Space Odor Mystery
game.categories: Single-player, Mouse Only Option, Save Anytime, Touch Only Option, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Isometric retro point-and-click adventure that could have launched on the C64 in 1985: tricky puzzles, a delightfully twisted story, and authentic pixels in a modern guise. Head to Space Station E-17 and uncover the mystery of the legendary party artefact.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Isometric retro point-and-click adventure that could have launched on the C64 in 1985: tricky puzzles, a delightfully twisted story, and authentic pixels in a modern guise. Head to Space Station E-17 and uncover the mystery of the legendary party artefact.
